mapper.select: select distinct api_key from lamp where device_id=#{_parameter};
select distinct imei from lamp where device_id=#{deviceId};
select distinct device_id, imei from lamp;
select distinct device_id, device_name from lamp where id in ( select lamp_id from lamp_region where region_id in (select id from region where organization_id = #{organId}));

select concat(obj_id, '_', obj_inst_id, '_',res_id) as dataStreamId, description from lamp as a left join lamp_resource as b on a.id = b.lamp_id left join onenet_resource as c on c.id = b.onenet_resource_id where device_id = #{_parameter} and b.status != 2;

select concat(obj_id, '_', obj_inst_id, '_',res_id) as dataStreamId, description from lamp as a left join lamp_resource as b on a.id = b.lamp_id left join onenet_resource as c on c.id = b.onenet_resource_id where device_id = #{_parameter} and b.status = 0;

select distinct a.device_name as DeviceName, c.name as RegionName, c.id as RegionId from lamp as a left join lamp_region as b on b.lamp_id = a.id left join region as c on c.id = b.region_id where a.device_id = #{deviceId} and c.type = #{regionType};

select distinct a.device_name as DeviceName, c.name as RegionName, c.id as RegionId from lamp as a left join lamp_region as b on b.lamp_id = a.id left join region as c on c.id = b.region_id where a.id = #{lampId} and c.type = #{regionType};

select a.device_id as deviceId, a.device_name as deviceName, c.id as resourceId, c.description as resourceDesc, c.type as resourceType from lamp as a left join lamp_resource as b on b.lamp_id = a.id left join onenet_resource as c on c.id = b.onenet_resource_id where a.device_id = #{deviceId};

select device_id, device_name, c.id as cameraId, c.rtsp_url, c.rtmp, c.record_audio, c.flv_url from lamp as a left join lamp_camera as b on b.lamp_id = a.id left join camera as c on c.id = b.camera_id where a.device_id = #{deviceId} and a.status != 2 and c.status != 1;
